=== Testing VPMOVZXBQ ===

Test 1: 128-bit operand
Source: [0x80, 0x7F]
Result: [0x0000000000000080, 0x000000000000007F]
Expected: [0x0000000000000080, 0x000000000000007F]
Test 1 PASSED

Test 2: 256-bit operand
Source: [0x80, 0x7F, 0x00, 0xFF]
Result: [0x0000000000000080, 0x000000000000007F, 0x0000000000000000, 0x00000000000000FF]
Expected: [0x0000000000000080, 0x000000000000007F, 0x0000000000000000, 0x00000000000000FF]
Test 2 PASSED
